name: Keep away from meeeeee, by Ben Humphries and Jonathan Segal
name_original: Keep away from meeeeee, by Ben Humphries and Jonathan Segal
description:
Keep your distance! Don't get eaten

Controls: 

Move, WASD or arrow keys

Five abilities: Basic, fireball, shadow, teleport, spike. activate w/ 12345, zxcvb, or ghjkl.

Basic is onehit kill.

fireball 'splodes

shadow leaves a shadow, activating again will tp back to it

teleport jumps forwards a bit

spike leaves a spike

twitter @jonathansegal9
